archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0855
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want all customer or employee accounts viewed by a representative of Vodafone are logged and easily accessible to me to review by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
